tools

Class TaskGraphVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.GMLExporter
      • tools.TaskGraphVisualizer

  • public class TaskGraphVisualizer
extends GMLExporter
    Task Graph visualizer. Suggested workflow: - create an instance and invoke exportGML() method - use external tool (yEd) to draw the GML file
    Author:
    "Kostiantyn Kucher"

    • Method Detail

      • exportGML

        public void exportGML(java.lang.String baseFilename,
                      TaskGraph.START allTaskGraphs)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Exports the visualization of Task Graph to a GML file
        Parameters:
        baseFilename - exported file name (without extension)
        allTaskGraphs - map of unique scope ID to Task Graphs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing to external file has failed
